topSection.title: I’m Lixing SUN
topSection.subtitle: A Developer/Consultant based in China.
topSection.paragraph: With 7 years of software development experience, I specialize in frontend development while also possessing practical expertise in backend development, architecture design, and DevOps. I have successfully managed several end-to-end product lifecycles from conceptualization to release. Extensive experience leading Agile teams gives me a deep understanding of Agile development. I am a motivated, responsible, and team-oriented professional, known for my fast learning ability and strong can-do attitude.

content.title: Travel
content.content: I greatly enjoy traveling with my family. It allows me to experience new sights and cultures, and to meet people from diverse backgrounds. Traveling helps me escape the hustle and bustle of urban life and reconnect with nature. Each journey is a new adventure, enriching my perspective and creating lasting memories with my loved ones.

content.title: Drawing
content.content: Influenced by my parents, I began learning to draw as a child. I have explored various forms of art, such as traditional Chinese painting and oil painting. This artistic journey has continuously improved my aesthetic sense and nurtured my creativity. In recent years, I have developed an interest in pixel art and enjoy creating pieces using Procreate on my iPad or Aseprite on my PC. Drawing remains a profound way for me to express myself and stay imaginative.

content.title: Esports
content.content: Video games have been my favorite pastime since I was very young. I love the thrill of unpredictable journeys, especially when playing with friends, and immersing myself in the fantastical worlds created by game developers. My favorite esports game is Teamfight Tactics (TFT), where I enjoy competing against top players from China and around the world. I have participated in several competitions and won some prizes including a championship. Gaming not only entertains me but also sharpens my strategic thinking and teamwork skills.
